span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vi. 雕刻,切开： to create a three-dimensional representation of (something) using solid material
【例】 carved a statue out of rare marble 用纯的大理石雕刻了一尊雕像
【近】 sculpture
【考法 2】 v. （通过长期不懈努力）产生或导致： to produce or bring about especially by long or repeated effort
【例】 finally carved out a niche for the sport in the school's athletic program 【例】 carve out a way through the enemy
【近】 forge伪造；锻造；前进, grind out, thrash out, work out, work up
【记】 cut 或 音：刻 + v 象是刀尖，或刻出来的槽；音：刻纹
